title: Donald MacDonald (rugby union)
text:
Donald Shaw Mackinnon Macdonald (born 25 September 1951) was a Scottish international <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
He was capped for seven times between 1977 and 1978. He also played for <a href="Oxford%20University%20RFC">Oxford University RFC</a>, <a href="London%20Scottish%20FC">London Scottish FC</a>, and <a href="West%20of%20Scotland%20FC">West of Scotland FC</a>.
His older brother <a href="Dugald%20MacDonald">Dugald MacDonald</a> was also capped for against the <a href="1974%20British%20Lions%20tour%20to%20South%20Africa">1974 British Lions tour to South Africa</a>.
